ack.title: Acknowledgments:
ack.p: We are very grateful to Bounthaphany Bounxouei, the past director of Mahosot Hospital; to the staff of the Infectious Disease Center and Microbiology Laboratory; to Chanphomma Vongsamphan, the director of Department of Health Care, the Ministry of Health; and to H. E. Bounkong Syhavong, the Minister of Health, Lao PDR, for their very kind help and support.
